Kine-Pass Gekijou:
The T-Joy theater chain will also screen three "Kine-Pass Gekijou" (Kine-Pass Theater) commercials to promote its Kine-Pass ticket sales app using the chibified Chen-Kuro Gakuen characters.

(Source: ANN)

['Chain Chronicle: Haecceitas no Hikari Part 1', 'Chain Chronicle: Haecceitas no Hikari Part 2', 'Chain Chronicle: Haecceitas no Hikari Part 3', 'Chen-Kuro Gakuen', 'Kuro-Nikuru Girls', 'Chein Kuro-Nikuru!!']
